projects.title: Stock Trading Application
projects.description: I took on a lot of new challenges to develop this project!  This was my first fullstack application.  I used TypeScript on the client, and I also deployed to AWS for the first time! To use this application, a user needs to register, and then they can trade using our fake paper trading money

projects.title: Twitter API Showcase App
projects.description: I feel like a much more compotent developer after completing this project! I learned the basics of Typescript, how to add a back-end server, as well as navigating complex API documentation.

projects.title: Star Wars API Character Guide
projects.description: Creating this app helped me strengthen my react skills as well as  handling data fetching and displaying the data in a clean and effective format.  The external link below is to a video I made explaining how some of the main components work.

projects.title: React Expense Tracker
projects.description: I really enjoyed learning the fundamentals of react such as, component structure, react hooks, state management, and form handling.
